text.craftgr.config.title: CraftGR Settings
text.craftgr.config.option.playback.desc: Toggles whether the music is playing or stopped.
text.craftgr.config.option.volume.descri: Playback volume of Gensokyo Radio music.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayVisibi: Option for when the song overlay is visible.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayPositi: Option for where to display the song info overlay at.
text.craftgr.config.option.openAlbum: Click Overlay to Open Album Info
text.craftgr.config.option.openAlbum.des: Whether to open the album info webpage or not when clicking the song overlay.
Whether to hide the album cover image or not in the song info overlay.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayBgColo: Background color of the song info overlay.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayBarCol: Progress bar color of the song info overlay.
How wide the song info overlay should be.
How large the song info overlay should be displayed.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlStream.des: URL to stream the audio from. Only works with MP3 streams.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlInfoJson.d: URL of the json API to get the current song information.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlAlbumArt.d: Base URL to get the album images from.
text.craftgr.config.option.connectTimeou: The number of milliseconds before the connection gets timed out when connecting to the stream.
text.craftgr.config.option.socketTimeout: The number of milliseconds before the connection gets timed out while streaming the music.
text.craftgr.button.config.disabled: Install YetAnotherConfigLib to open CraftGR settings menu.
